flawed_nl_solution:
He increases the length to 13+2=<<13+2=51>>51 feet
He increases the width to 18+2=<<18+2=20>>20 feet
So the rooms are 51*20=<<51*20=1020>>1020 square feet
So he has 1+3=<<1+3=4>>4 rooms of this size
So he has 4*1020=<<4*1020=4080>>4080 square feet of rooms this size
He also has one room of size 1020*2=<<1020*2=2040>>2040 square feet
So he has 4080+2040=<<4080+2040=6120>>6120 square feet of rooms
#### 6120

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
